item.description: Our depart times may be changed once we find out the details. http://www.mrra.us/fl... "...Calling all pilots and aviation enthusiasts! Join us for the Second Annual Brunswick International Fly-In June 2 and 3, 2012 at the Brunswick Executive Airport (BXM)! Since last year's inaugural fly-in was a wonderful success, we decided to make it a two-day event this year! As the unofficial start to summer, the Brunswick International Fly-In has an action packed line up of activities, such as: Business Aviation Expo Safety seminars Bi-plane rides Airplanes on display Overnight camping Local Maine food vendors Entertainment, and more! The Brunswick International Fly-In is free and open to the public. Fly in, drive in or bike in! There's something for the whole family!  Sponsors Interested in becoming a sponsor? Click Here! There are several sponsorship levels available to meet your needs. Business Aviation Expo The Business Aviation Expo is a two-day aviation industry focused expo held in conjunction with the Second Annual Brunswick International Fly-In.  Click here to learn more about the Business Aviation Expo..."

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Brunswick Airport 2nd Annual Fly In
